title.rendered: How to Get Career Advice on Handshake

content.rendered:
As a college student, it feels like there are always teachers, advisors, family members, and more folks ready to dole out guidance about your future. But what about when you want career advice from somebody who’s actually been in your shoes, and recently? Watch the video below to get our team’s top tips for getting helpful career advice on Handshake, including:

  1. Explore Q&As
  2. Read employer reviews
  3. Send messages

excerpt.rendered: Learn tips for getting useful advice from fellow students and alumni using Handshake’s special features.
